Name: Sonic-FX
Natural: The Sonic-FX Solo delivers 40,000 strokes per minute with 3 brushing modes, a 2-minute timer, and replaceable heads. Lightweight and rechargeable, it includes an interdental brush for deep cleaning, ideal for those seeking powerful, hygienic oral care.

Name: Burst
Natural: The BURST Pro Sonic Toothbrush removes up to 10x more plaque with 3 cleaning modes, intuitive design, and a 2-minute timer. With a refill plan and clinical backing from 35k+ professionals, it’s built for users seeking tech-driven dental care.

Name: Waterpik
Natural: The Waterpik Sonic-Fusion 2.0 combines brushing and water flossing in one tool, offering 2x bristle tip speed, high/low settings, and LED mode indicators. Clinically proven to improve gum health, it’s ideal for users wanting efficient all-in-one care.

Name: FOREO
Natural: The FOREO ISSA mikro uses silicone bristles and Sonic Pulse Technology with 6,000 gentle pulsations per minute. Designed for babies, it offers brush and massage modes, never needs head replacement, and helps build early oral care habits.

Name: Quip
Natural: The Quip electric toothbrush features timed sonic vibrations, a 3-month battery, and a slim, travel-friendly design. ADA-accepted and refillable with eco-friendly options, it’s great for minimalists who value form, function, and simplicity.

Name: Philips
Natural: The Philips Sonicare DiamondClean Smart 9500 removes up to 10x more plaque and improves gum health in 2 weeks. With app-guided feedback and 4 brush heads, it’s ideal for complete oral care and visible whitening in just 3 days.

Name: Colgate
Natural: The Colgate hum smart toothbrush delivers personalized brushing guidance via app, 3 sonic modes, and a 2-minute timer. With a rechargeable battery, soft replaceable head, and ergonomic grip, it’s perfect for users seeking smarter brushing.

Name: Oral-B
Natural: The Oral-B Pro 1000 uses 3D cleaning action to remove 300% more plaque along the gumline, with pressure sensor, timer, and 3 modes. Rechargeable and dentist-recommended, it’s built for users seeking a simple, powerful upgrade from manual brushes.
